title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: February 13, 2023, 08:54:55 PMLast edit: February 15, 2023, 02:47:43 PM by minerjones
content: Fresh off the printing presses comes the latest offering from Polymerbit:"DIY COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION NOTE"Comes printed on a full size sheet of polymer and then can be cut into it's triangle shape and keys assembledThese are ONLY for laser printers. Please do not buy if you have an inkjet or dot-matrix  printerThis is to help plan out and design new keyless versions of notes that will be made in the future by PolymerbitPrice: $15 per noteLimit: 2 notes per person (for now)15 notes available currentlyEU customers can order from CoinsofNakamoto: https://www.coinsofnakamoto.com/notes/polymerbit-diy-community-participation-note?pk_campaign=Bitcointalk
